title: Jonas
body:
Hello Detective.
I've finished my prelimanary examination of the body.
What would you like to know?
[[What was the cause of death? |Jonas.CauseOfDeath]]
[[Nothing for now. |Jonas.Exit]]

title: Jonas.Exit
body: Okay, well feel free to come back and ask any questions.

title: Jonas.CauseOfDeath
body:
The exact cause of death is unclear at this stage.
What I can say for sure, is that the victim was attacked by multiple assailants.
There are multiple injuries to the face, possibly inflicted by bare hands.
The victim has also been shot through the stomach.
Though it's puzzling that the victim died from these.
[[Let's talk about these facial injuries|Jonas.FaceInjuries]]
[[What details to you have about the gunshot wound? |Jonas.Gunshot]]
[[What's puzzling? |Jonas.Mystery]]

title: Jonas.FaceInjuries
body:
The face has been struck multiple times.
There's a couple of chipped teeth, and a lot of bruising around the right side of the face.
This indicates a pretty powerful punch was delivered before the victim died.
I'll be able to let you know more once I take x-rays of the skull.
[[Let's talk about the gunshot wound next|Jonas.Gunshot]]
[[What was strange about these wounds?|Jonas.Mystery]]
[[Thanks Jonas, I'll come back if there's anything else|Jonas.Exit]]

title: Jonas.Gunshot
body:
The bullet entered through the abdomen and pierced the large intestine and pancreas before it exited near the nape of the back.
From the damage and fragments left behind, the bullet was likely full metal jacket 5.56mm. Used by the military, but still can be bought easily on the street.
It's strange though, this damage shouldn't have been as catastrophic as it was.
[[What about the facial wounds?|Jonas.FaceInjuries]]
[[Why are these wounds strange?|Jonas.Mystery]]
[[Have you run ballistics on the bullet yet?|Jonas.Ballistics]]
[[Thanks Jonas, I'll come back if there's anything else|Jonas.Exit]]

title: Jonas.Mystery
body:
Well it's strange.
The bullet wound was fatal, but not immediately.
A wound like that would have taken a few days to die from.
Likewise, the punch to the face was heavy, but definitely not lethal.
Even together, the two wounds wouldn't have caused death as quickly as these wounds have.
I'm still waiting on the blood toxicology to come back. Maybe that will tell me more.
[[Tell me more about the bullet wound.|Jonas.Gunshot]]
[[Give me details about the facial injuries|Jonas.FaceInjuries]]
[[Thanks Jonas, I'll come back if there's anything else|Jonas.Exit]]

title: Jonas.Ballistics
body:
I sent the bullet off to the labs. If we get a match, I'll let you know.
Based on the entry and exit wounds, the rifle was likely fired from 2 or 3 blocks away.
The chief has got officers checking the area at the moment.
[[What about the facial wounds?|Jonas.FaceInjuries]]
[[Why are these wounds strange?|Jonas.Mystery]]
[[Thanks Jonas, I'll come back if there's anything else|Jonas.Exit]]
